column1: Little Goat Diner////I've only been here for lunch a few times. All the sandwich options are generous portions- the turkey club is a safe but tasty sandwich (I always take half home). Everyone always likes their selected sandwiches
column2: too. The chickpea salad is not your typical salad
column3: and I appreciate that when I want a "lighter" lunch
column4: but don't want to be hungry after. The falafels are amazing and flavorful.. my only mistake was putting too much of the dressing in (my fault
column5: but it made the salad too citrusy). Can't wait to try the creole chicken sandwich next time!
